02421       DendroIntL globalBlocksSizeAux;
02422       DendroIntL localBlocksSize = damg[i]->da->getNumBlocks();
02423       DendroIntL localBlocksSizeAux;
02424 
02425       if(damg[i]->da_aux) {
02426         localBlocksSizeAux = damg[i]->da_aux->getNumBlocks();
02427       }
02428 
02429       DendroIntL elemSizeLocal = damg[i]->da->getElementSize();
02430       DendroIntL ghostedElemSizeLocal = damg[i]->da->getGhostedElementSize();
02431       DendroIntL elemSizeLocalAux;      
02432       DendroIntL ghostedElemSizeLocalAux;       
02433 
02434       if(damg[i]->da_aux) {
02435         elemSizeLocalAux = damg[i]->da_aux->getElementSize();
02436         ghostedElemSizeLocalAux = damg[i]->da_aux->getGhostedElementSize();
02437       } 
02438 
02439       DendroIntL elemSizeGlobal;
02440       DendroIntL minElemSize;
02441       DendroIntL maxElemSize;
02442       DendroIntL minGhostedElemSize;
02443       DendroIntL maxGhostedElemSize;
02444 
02445       DendroIntL elemSizeGlobalAux;
02446       DendroIntL minElemSizeAux;
02447       DendroIntL maxElemSizeAux;
02448       DendroIntL minGhostedElemSizeAux;
02449       DendroIntL maxGhostedElemSizeAux;
02450 
02451       if(damg[i]->da->iAmActive()) {
02452         par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&localBlocksSize, &globalBlocksSize, 1, 
02453             MPI_SUM, 0, activeComm);
02454 
02455         par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&elemSizeLocal, &elemSizeGlobal, 1, 
02456             MPI_SUM, 0, activeComm);
02457 
02458         par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&elemSizeLocal, &minElemSize, 1, 
02459             MPI_MIN, 0, activeComm);
02460 
02461         par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&elemSizeLocal, &maxElemSize, 1, 
02462             MPI_MAX, 0, activeComm);
02463 
02464         par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&ghostedElemSizeLocal, &minGhostedElemSize, 1, 
02465             MPI_MIN, 0, activeComm);
02466 
02467         par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&ghostedElemSizeLocal, &maxGhostedElemSize, 1, 
02468             MPI_MAX, 0, activeComm);
02469       }
02470 
02471       if(damg[i]->da_aux) {
02472         if(damg[i]->da_aux->iAmActive()) {
02473           par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&localBlocksSizeAux, &globalBlocksSizeAux, 1, 
02474               MPI_SUM, 0, activeAuxComm);
02475 
02476           par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&elemSizeLocalAux, &elemSizeGlobalAux, 1, 
02477               MPI_SUM, 0, activeAuxComm);
02478 
02479           par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&elemSizeLocalAux, &minElemSizeAux, 1,  
02480               MPI_MIN, 0, activeAuxComm);
02481 
02482           par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&elemSizeLocalAux, &maxElemSizeAux, 1, 
02483               MPI_MAX, 0, activeAuxComm);
02484 
02485           par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&ghostedElemSizeLocalAux, &minGhostedElemSizeAux, 1, 
02486               MPI_MIN, 0, activeAuxComm);
02487 
02488           par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&ghostedElemSizeLocalAux, &maxGhostedElemSizeAux, 1, 
02489               MPI_MAX, 0, activeAuxComm);
02490         }
02491       } 
02492 
02493       DendroIntL nodeSizeLocal = damg[i]->da->getNodeSize();
02494       DendroIntL nodeSizeLocalAux;
02495 
02496       if(damg[i]->da_aux) {
02497         nodeSizeLocalAux = damg[i]->da_aux->getNodeSize();
02498       }
02499 
02500       DendroIntL nodeSizeGlobal;
02501       DendroIntL minNodeSize;
02502       DendroIntL maxNodeSize;
02503 
02504       if(damg[i]->da->iAmActive()) {
02505         par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&nodeSizeLocal, &nodeSizeGlobal, 1, 
02506             MPI_SUM, 0, activeComm);
02507 
02508         par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&nodeSizeLocal, &minNodeSize, 1, 
02509             MPI_MIN, 0, activeComm);
02510 
02511         par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&nodeSizeLocal, &maxNodeSize, 1, 
02512             MPI_MAX, 0, activeComm);
02513       }
02514 
02515       DendroIntL nodeSizeGlobalAux;
02516       DendroIntL minNodeSizeAux;
02517       DendroIntL maxNodeSizeAux;
02518 
02519       if(damg[i]->da_aux) {
02520         if(damg[i]->da_aux->iAmActive()) {
02521           par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&nodeSizeLocalAux, &nodeSizeGlobalAux, 1, 
02522               MPI_SUM, 0, activeAuxComm);
02523 
02524           par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&nodeSizeLocalAux, &minNodeSizeAux, 1, 
02525               MPI_MIN, 0, activeAuxComm);
02526 
02527           par::Mpi_Reduce<DendroIntL>(&nodeSizeLocalAux, &maxNodeSizeAux, 1, 
02528               MPI_MAX, 0, activeAuxComm);
02529         }
02530       }
02531 
02532       unsigned int globalMinLev = getGlobalMinLevel(damg[i]->da);
02533       unsigned int globalMaxLev = getGlobalMaxLevel(damg[i]->da);
02534 
02535       unsigned int globalMinLevAux;
02536       if(damg[i]->da_aux) {     
02537         globalMinLevAux = getGlobalMinLevel(damg[i]->da_aux);
02538       }
02539       unsigned int globalMaxLevAux;
02540       if(damg[i]->da_aux) {
02541         globalMaxLevAux = getGlobalMaxLevel(damg[i]->da_aux);
02542       }
02543 
02544       int fullNpes = damg[i]->da->getNpesAll();
02545       int fullNpesAux;
02546       if(damg[i]->da_aux) {
02547         fullNpesAux = damg[i]->da_aux->getNpesAll();
02548       }
02549 
02550       int activeNpes = damg[i]->da->getNpesActive();
02551       int activeNpesAux;
02552       if(damg[i]->da_aux) {
02553         activeNpesAux = damg[i]->da_aux->getNpesActive();
02554       }
02555 
02556       if(!rank) {
02557         std::cout<<"At Level "<<i<<" Elem size: "<<elemSizeGlobal
02558           <<", GlobalBlocksSize: "<<globalBlocksSize
02559           <<", node size: "<<nodeSizeGlobal
02560           <<", minElemSize: "<<minElemSize
02561           <<", maxElemSize: "<<maxElemSize
02562           <<", minGhostedElemSize: "<<minGhostedElemSize
02563           <<", maxGhostedElemSize: "<<maxGhostedElemSize
02564           <<", minNodeSize: "<<minNodeSize
02565           <<", maxNodeSize: "<<maxNodeSize
02566           <<", min Lev: "<<globalMinLev
02567           <<", max Lev: "<<globalMaxLev
02568           <<", Active Npes: "<<activeNpes 
02569           <<", Full Npes: "<<fullNpes<<std::endl; 
02570         fflush(stdout);
02571         if(damg[i]->da_aux) {
02572           std::cout<<"At AUX Level "<<i<<" Elem size: "<<elemSizeGlobalAux
02573             <<", GlobalBlocksSize: "<<globalBlocksSizeAux
02574             <<", node size: "<<nodeSizeGlobalAux
02575             <<", minElemSize: "<<minElemSizeAux
02576             <<", maxElemSize: "<<maxElemSizeAux
02577             <<", minGhostedElemSize: "<<minGhostedElemSizeAux
02578             <<", maxGhostedElemSize: "<<maxGhostedElemSizeAux
02579             <<", minNodeSize: "<<minNodeSizeAux
02580             <<", maxNodeSize: "<<maxNodeSizeAux
02581             <<", min Lev: "<<globalMinLevAux
02582             <<", max Lev: "<<globalMaxLevAux
02583             <<", Active Npes: "<<activeNpesAux
02584             <<", Full Npes: "<<fullNpesAux<<std::endl; 
02585           fflush(stdout);
02586         }
02587       }//end if p0
02588     }//end for i
02589   }//end function
02590 
02591   //Private Functions...
02592 
02593   PetscErrorCode PC_KSP_Shell_SetUp(void* ctx) {
02594 
02595     PROF_PC_KSP_SHELL_SETUP_BEGIN
02596 
02597       PC_KSP_Shell* data = static_cast<PC_KSP_Shell*>(ctx); 
02598 
02599     MPI_Comm commActive = data->commActive;
02600     bool iAmActive = data->iAmActive;
02601 
02602     //This points to the shell itself
02603     PC pc = data->pc;
02604 
02605     Mat Amat;
02606     PCGetOperators(pc, &Amat, NULL, NULL);      
02607     PetscTruth isshell;
02608     PetscTypeCompare((PetscObject)Amat, MATSHELL, &isshell);
02609 
02610     if(!isshell) {
02611       SETERRQ(PETSC_ERR_SUP, " Expected a MATSHELL.");
02612     }
02613 
02614     //Create ksp_private, rhs_private, sol_private,
02615     if(iAmActive) {
02616       Mat Amat_private;
02617       Mat Pmat_private;
02618       MatStructure pFlag;
02619 
02620       if(getPrivateMatricesForKSP_Shell) {
02621         (*getPrivateMatricesForKSP_Shell)(Amat, &Amat_private,
02622                                           &Pmat_private, &pFlag);
02623       } else {
02624         SETERRQ(PETSC_ERR_USER,
02625             " Expected function to be set:\
02626             getPrivateMatricesForKSP_Shell");
02627       }
02628 
02629       //Sanity Checks
02630       assert(Amat_private != NULL);
02631 
02632       PetscInt globalRowSize;
02633       PetscInt globalColSize;
02634       PetscInt localRowSize;
02635       PetscInt localColSize;
02636 
02637       PetscInt globalRowSizePrivate;
02638       PetscInt globalColSizePrivate;
02639       PetscInt localRowSizePrivate;
02640       PetscInt localColSizePrivate;
02641 
02642       MatGetSize(Amat, &globalRowSize, &globalColSize);
02643       MatGetSize(Amat_private, &globalRowSizePrivate, &globalColSizePrivate);
02644 
02645       MatGetLocalSize(Amat, &localRowSize, &localColSize);
02646       MatGetLocalSize(Amat_private, &localRowSizePrivate, &localColSizePrivate);
02647 
02648       assert(globalRowSize == globalRowSizePrivate);
02649       assert(globalColSize == globalColSizePrivate);
02650 
02651       assert(localRowSize == localRowSizePrivate);
02652       assert(localColSize == localColSizePrivate);
02653 
02654       MPI_Comm privateComm;
02655       PetscObjectGetComm((PetscObject)Amat_private, &privateComm);
02656 
02657       int commCompareResult;
02658 
02659       //PetscHeaderCreate_Private duplicates comm
02660       //instead of a simple copy. So, the comms will not exactly be
02661       //identical. But, they will be equivalent  
02662       MPI_Comm_compare(privateComm, commActive, &commCompareResult);
02663 
02664       assert( (commCompareResult == MPI_CONGRUENT) || (commCompareResult == MPI_IDENT));
02665 
02666       if(pc->setupcalled == 0) {
02667         assert(data->ksp_private == NULL);
02668         assert(data->rhs_private == NULL);
02669         assert(data->sol_private == NULL);
02670       } else {
02671         assert(data->ksp_private != NULL);
02672         assert(data->rhs_private != NULL);
02673         assert(data->sol_private != NULL);
02674       }
02675 
02676       if(pc->setupcalled == 0) {
02677         KSPCreate(commActive, &(data->ksp_private));
02678 
02679         const char *prefix;
02680         PCGetOptionsPrefix(pc, &prefix);
02681 
02682         //These functions also set the correct prefix for the inner pc 
02683         KSPSetOptionsPrefix(data->ksp_private, prefix);
02684         KSPAppendOptionsPrefix(data->ksp_private, "private_");
02685 
02686         //Default Types for KSP and PC
02687         KSPSetType(data->ksp_private, KSPPREONLY);
02688 
02689         PC privatePC;
02690         KSPGetPC(data->ksp_private, &privatePC);
02691         PCSetType(privatePC, PCLU);
02692 
02693         //The command line options get higher precedence.
02694         //This also calls PCSetFromOptions for the private pc internally
02695         KSPSetFromOptions(data->ksp_private);  
02696 
02697         MatGetVecs(Amat_private, &(data->sol_private), &(data->rhs_private));
02698       }
02699 
02700       KSPSetOperators(data->ksp_private, Amat_private, Pmat_private, pFlag);
02701 
02702     } else {
02703       data->sol_private = NULL;
02704       data->rhs_private = NULL;
02705       data->ksp_private = NULL;
02706     }//end if active
02707 
02708     PROF_PC_KSP_SHELL_SETUP_END
02709 
02710   }
02711 
02712   PetscErrorCode PC_KSP_Shell_Destroy(void* ctx) {
02713 
02714     PROF_PC_KSP_SHELL_DESTROY_BEGIN
02715 
02716       PC_KSP_Shell* data = static_cast<PC_KSP_Shell*>(ctx); 
02717 
02718     if(data) {
02719       if(data->ksp_private) {
02720         KSPDestroy(data->ksp_private);
02721         data->ksp_private = NULL;
02722       }
02723 
02724       if(data->rhs_private) {
02725         VecDestroy(data->rhs_private);
02726         data->rhs_private = NULL;
02727       }
02728 
02729       if(data->sol_private) {
02730         VecDestroy(data->sol_private);
02731         data->sol_private = NULL;
02732       }
02733 
02734       delete data;
02735       data = NULL;
02736     }
02737 
02738     PROF_PC_KSP_SHELL_DESTROY_END
02739   }
02740 
02741   PetscErrorCode PC_KSP_Shell_Apply(void* ctx, Vec rhs, Vec sol) {
02742 
02743     PROF_PC_KSP_SHELL_APPLY_BEGIN
02744 
02745       PC_KSP_Shell* data = static_cast<PC_KSP_Shell*>(ctx); 
02746 
02747     if(data->iAmActive) {      
02748       PetscScalar* rhsArray;
02749       PetscScalar* solArray;
02750 
02751       //There are no copies and no mallocs involved.
02752 
02753       VecGetArray(rhs, &rhsArray);
02754       VecGetArray(sol, &solArray);
02755 
02756       VecPlaceArray(data->rhs_private, rhsArray);
02757       VecPlaceArray(data->sol_private, solArray);
02758 
02759       KSPSolve(data->ksp_private, data->rhs_private, data->sol_private);
02760 
02761       VecResetArray(data->rhs_private);
02762       VecResetArray(data->sol_private);
02763 
02764       VecRestoreArray(rhs, &rhsArray);
02765       VecRestoreArray(sol, &solArray);
02766     }
02767 
02768     PROF_PC_KSP_SHELL_APPLY_END
02769   }
02770 
02771   int scatterValues(Vec in, Vec out, PetscInt inSz, PetscInt outSz,
02772       int *& sendSz, int *& sendOff, int *& recvSz, int *& recvOff, MPI_Comm comm ) {
02773 
02774     PROF_MG_SCATTER_BEGIN 
02775 
02776       bool isNew = (sendSz == NULL);
02777 
02778     if(isNew) {
02779       int rank, npes;
02780 
02781       MPI_Comm_size(comm, &npes);
02782       MPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
02783 
02784       MPI_Request request;
02785       MPI_Status status;
02786 
02787       PetscInt inSize, outSize; 
02788 
02789       VecGetLocalSize(in, &inSize);
02790       VecGetLocalSize(out, &outSize);
02791 
02792       assert(inSize == inSz);
02793       assert(outSize == outSz);
02794 
02795       PetscInt  off1 = 0, off2 = 0;
02796       PetscInt* scnIn = NULL;
02797       if(inSz) {
02798         scnIn = new PetscInt [inSz]; 
02799       }
02800 
02801       // perform a local scan first ...
02802       PetscInt zero=0;
02803       if(inSz) {
02804         scnIn[0] = 1;
02805         for (PetscInt i = 1; i < inSz; i++) {
02806           scnIn[i] = scnIn[i-1] + 1;
02807         }//end for
02808         // now scan with the final members of 
02809         par::Mpi_Scan<PetscInt>(scnIn+inSz-1, &off1, 1, MPI_SUM, comm ); 
02810       } else{
02811         par::Mpi_Scan<PetscInt>(&zero, &off1, 1, MPI_SUM, comm ); 
02812       }
02813 
02814       // communicate the offsets ...
02815       if (rank < (npes-1)){
02816         par::Mpi_Issend<PetscInt>( &off1, 1, rank+1, 0, comm, &request );
02817       }
02818       if (rank){
02819         par::Mpi_Recv<PetscInt>( &off2, 1, rank-1, 0, comm, &status );
02820       } else{
02821         off2 = 0; 
02822       }
02823 
02824       // add offset to local array
02825       for (PetscInt i = 0; i < inSz; i++) {
02826         scnIn[i] = scnIn[i] + off2;  // This has the global scan results now ...
02827       }//end for
02828 
02829       //Gather Scan of outCnts
02830       PetscInt* outCnts;
02831       outCnts = new PetscInt[npes];
02832 
02833       if(rank < (npes-1)) {
02834         MPI_Status statusWait;
02835         MPI_Wait(&request, &statusWait);
02836       }
02837 
02838       if( outSz ) {
02839         par::Mpi_Scan<PetscInt>( &outSz, &off1, 1, MPI_SUM, comm ); 
02840       }else {
02841         par::Mpi_Scan<PetscInt>( &zero, &off1, 1, MPI_SUM, comm ); 
02842       }
02843 
02844       par::Mpi_Allgather<PetscInt>( &off1, outCnts, 1, comm);
02845 
02846 #ifdef __DEBUG_MG__
02847       assert(sendSz == NULL);
02848       assert(recvSz == NULL);
02849       assert(sendOff == NULL);
02850       assert(recvOff == NULL);
02851 #endif
02852 
02853       sendSz = new int [npes];
02854       recvSz = new int [npes];
02855       sendOff = new int [npes];
02856       recvOff = new int [npes];
02857 
02858       // compute the partition offsets and sizes so that All2Allv can be performed.
02859       // initialize ...
02860       for (int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
02861         sendSz[i] = 0;
02862       }
02863 
02864       //The Heart of the algorithm....
02865       //scnIn and outCnts are both sorted 
02866       PetscInt inCnt = 0;
02867       int pCnt = 0;
02868       while( (inCnt < inSz) && (pCnt < npes) ) {
02869         if( scnIn[inCnt] <= outCnts[pCnt]  ) {
02870           sendSz[pCnt]++;
02871           inCnt++;
02872         }else {
02873           pCnt++;
02874         }
02875       }
02876 
02877       // communicate with other procs how many you shall be sending and get how
02878       // many to recieve from whom.
02879       par::Mpi_Alltoall<int>(sendSz, recvSz, 1, comm);
02880 
02881       PetscInt nn=0; // new value of nlSize, ie the local nodes.
02882       for (int i = 0; i < npes; i++) {
02883         nn += recvSz[i];
02884       }
02885 
02886       // compute offsets ...
02887       sendOff[0] = 0;
02888       recvOff[0] = 0;
02889       for (int i=1; i<npes; i++) {
02890         sendOff[i] = sendOff[i-1] + sendSz[i-1];
02891         recvOff[i] = recvOff[i-1] + recvSz[i-1];
02892       }
02893 
02894       assert(nn == outSz);
02895       // clean up...
02896       if(scnIn) {
02897         delete [] scnIn;
02898       }
02899       delete [] outCnts;
02900     }//end if isNew
02901 
02902     // perform All2All  ... 
02903     PetscScalar * inArr;
02904     PetscScalar * outArr;
02905 
02906     VecGetArray(in,&inArr);
02907     VecGetArray(out,&outArr);
02908 
02909     par::Mpi_Alltoallv_sparse<PetscScalar>(inArr, sendSz, sendOff, 
02910         outArr, recvSz, recvOff, comm);
02911 
02912     VecRestoreArray(in,&inArr);
02913     VecRestoreArray(out,&outArr);
02914 
02915     PROF_MG_SCATTER_END 
02916   }//end function
02917 
02918 }//end namespace
02919
